title: Complete Project Proposal
description: Draft and finalize the project proposal document for the upcoming client presentation.

title: Prepare Presentation Slides
description: Create slides for the client presentation based on the project proposal.

title: Review Weekly Reports
description: Review and provide feedback on the weekly reports submitted by team members.

title: Schedule Team Meeting
description: Coordinate with team members and schedule a meeting to discuss project updates.

title: Research Market Trends
description: Conduct research on current market trends relevant to the project.

title: Update Project Timeline
description: Revise and update the project timeline based on recent developments.

title: Send Progress Report to Client
description: Prepare and send a progress report to the client detailing project status and achievements.

title: Follow-Up on Action Items
description: Follow up with team members on pending action items from the last meeting.

title: Conduct Performance Reviews
description: Schedule and conduct performance reviews for team members.

title: Brainstorm Marketing Strategies
description: Organize a brainstorming session to generate innovative marketing strategies.
